title: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity - v1.0.1 + DLC + Yuzu/Ryujinx Emus for PC - FitGirl Repacks
repackFeatures: Based on Switch release with Update v65536 installed over (v1.0.1): 10.8 GB
Pre-order DLC added and activated for all emulators
Three versions of Switch emulators are included: Yuzu Mainline v456, Yuzu Early Access v1165 and Ryujinx v1.0.6854
Switch Firmware v11.0.1 (317 MB) added as a requirement for Ryujinx
Older (end of 2020) Yuzu v456/v1165 EA versions have the best perfomance in OpenGL mode, while newer builds has terrible perfomance and thus are not included
If one of Yuzus don’t work for you properly, try another one

Ryujinx has a better accuracy in emulation, but is relatively slow, so you can’t play with it properly on a 4-threaded CPUs. More powerful machine is required – so it’s recommended for modern 8+ threaded CPUs
Shader cache foro Yuzu is included and enabled by default for smoother gameplay – you may delete it in games properties by opening and cleaning transferrable cache folder
Vulkan in inluded Yuzu versions is not compatible with this game, most probably it will crash at the beginning of the first level

Currently the support of AMD GPUs is not very good in Ryujinx, so if you have one – most likely the game won’t work for you in this emu, use Yuzu
Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
